resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit this quiz?
Are you sure you want to log out? You need to be logged in to play or search for playlists.
Are you sure you want to delete %1$s? This will not affect any Spotify playlists, and you can add it again later.
Are you sure you want to clear image cache? This will reduce memory usage, but may increase network traffic.
Are you sure you want to delete all playlists? This will not affect playlists on Spotify, and you can add them again later.
Are you sure you want to delete your local data and restore the defaults? This will not affect anything on Spotify.

We use Spotify to access a wide range of songs. We need you to be logged in to play music for you. You enter your login information on Spotify\'s interface - we only access user information to which you have previously consented.
Are you sure you want to exit?
